p: Gas chromatography was carried out using Varian CP-3800 system equipped with a flame ionization detector (FID) and a CP-Sil 8CB fused-silica column (50 m × 0.25 mm, film thickness 0.12 m). The injector temperature and detector temperature were 260 and 280 °C, respectively. The initial GC oven temperature was held at 50 °C for 5 min, then increased up to 250 °C with 3 °C /min and held constant at 250 °C for 10 min. The split ratio was used at 1:5, with the carrier gas, N2 (2 ml/min).
